<a id="Texture"></a>

# Texture

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [Texture2D](Texture2D.md), [Texture3D](Texture3D.md), [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md)

Base class for all texture types.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Texture** is the base class for all texture types. Common texture types are [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) and [ImageTexture](ImageTexture.md). See also [Image](Image.md).
